biotools.summary: Tool for annotating tables written in Java. It uses specific annotation schema we proposed that is able to capture information about functions of a cell and inter-cell relationships. It is a tool for extracting annotations from tables in PMC and DailyMed in XML format.

bioschemas.name: TableAnnotator
bioschemas.summary: Tool for annotating tables written in Java. It uses specific annotation schema we proposed that is able to capture information about functions of a cell and inter-cell relationships. It is a tool for extracting annotations from tables in PMC and DailyMed in XML format.
